mapper.insert:
select REPLACE(UUID(),'-','')
insert into testcase (id,case_name,case_level,assert_type,assert_header_list,assert_resbody_list,create_time,update_time,http_id) values (#{id},#{caseName},#{caseLevel},#{assertType},#{assertHeaderList},#{assertResbodyList},now(),now(), #{httpEntity.id})
